subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Starter R. A. Dickey allowed a three-run homer to Jayson Werth in the first inning and gave up nothing after that, but he still took the loss to fall to 5-9.
snippet: Starter R. A. Dickey allowed a three-run homer to Jayson Werth in the first inning and gave up nothing after that, but he still took the loss to fall to 5-9.
